(¬(A14 ∨ (A12 → A13)) → A15).natural: If it is not the case that either equipment is functional in the Arctic region or if data collection has been completed in the Arctic region then samples have been processed in the Arctic region, then technical assistance has been dispatched to the Arctic region.

(¬(A5 ∨ A6) → A7).natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that either private funding has been secured for the climate study or government funding has been allocated for the climate study, alternative funding has been approved for the climate study.

(¬(¬(A14 ∨ (A12 → A13)) → ¬A15) → A16).natural: Should it not be the case that if it is not the case that either equipment is functional in the Arctic region or if data collection has been completed in the Arctic region then samples have been processed in the Arctic region, then technical assistance has not been dispatched to the Arctic region, then emergency repair has been completed in the Arctic region.

(¬(¬(A42 → (A41 ∨ ¬A40)) → ¬A43) → A44).natural: In the event that it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the scientific committee has approved the EPA then a new protocol has been developed by the EPA or the traditional approach has not been maintained by the EPA, then the methodology is not disputed, then independent validation is required.

(¬(¬(A42 → (A41 ∨ ¬A40)) → ¬A43) → ¬A44).natural: If it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the scientific committee has approved the EPA then a new protocol has been developed by the EPA or the traditional approach has not been maintained by the EPA, then the methodology is not disputed, then independent validation is not required.
